other_tests.findings: Perforated left coronary cusp and an aortic root abscess.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeated echocardiography showed deterioration from a previously observed abnormality.

other_tests.findings: Echodense aortic valve with a definite echodense lesion (size, 0.9 cm x 0.9 cm) at the junction of the right and left coronary cusps.

other_tests.changes_over_time: After the initiation of antibiotic therapy, cultures yielded negative results.

other_tests.date: Seventeen days after initiation of antibiotic therapy
other_tests.findings: Cultures tested positive for N. asteroides.
